document.full_text: monday morning skate: roundup of weekend action in the n.h.l., including gary bettman's contract extension, the devils' still-scant playoff chances and a nifty save by montreal defenseman hal gill.
document.title: monday morning skate: bettman's deal, norris race, remembering martin
